alert.note: Alert for Menard; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 1:46PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Menard and northwestern Sangamon Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Farmington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Athens around 200 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Springfield, Sherman, Riverton and Williamsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 96 and 107. Interstate 72 between mile markers 88 and 95, and between mile markers 102 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
